text: Kim Un-bae (김 은배; August 21, 1913 – February 15, 1980) was a Korean runner. He competed in the marathon at the 1932 Olympics and finished in sixth place. He competed for Japan under his Japanese name Kin Onbai as Korea was part of the Japanese Empire at the time. The name is based on the Japanese kanji pronunciation of his Korean hanja name 金 恩培. ==References== Category:1913 births Category:1980 deaths Category:Japanese male long-distance runners Category:Korean male long-distance runners Category:Olympic athletes of Japan Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1932 Summer Olympics Category:Korean male marathon runners
title: Kim Un-bae
